mapper.insert: insert into entries (id, datetime, latitude, longitude, accuracy, altitude, altaccuracy, site, setting, vegtype, notes, clientversion, imagekey, vegdens, substrate, nestinitdate, collectiongroup, deviceinfo, deleted, last_edited ) values( #{uuid}, #{location_timestamp}, #{location_lat}, #{location_lon}, #{location_accuracy}, #{location_z}, #{location_zaccuracy}, #{site_id},#{setting}, #{vegetation},#{notes}, #{client_version}, #{image_key}, #{density}, #{substrate}, #{nest_init}, #{collection_group}, #{device_info}, #{deleted}, #{last_edited} )
mapper.update: UPDATE entries SET datetime = #{location_timestamp}, latitude = #{location_lat}, longitude = #{location_lon}, accuracy = #{location_accuracy}, altitude = #{location_z}, altaccuracy = #{location_zaccuracy}, site = #{site_id}, setting = #{setting}, vegtype = #{vegetation}, notes = #{notes}, clientversion = #{client_version}, imagekey = #{image_key}, vegdens = #{density}, substrate = #{substrate}, nestinitdate = #{nest_init}, collectiongroup = #{collection_group}, deviceinfo = #{device_info}, deleted = #{deleted}, last_edited = #{last_edited} WHERE id = #{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT id, datetime, latitude, longitude, accuracy, altitude, altaccuracy, site, setting, vegtype, notes, clientversion, imagekey, vegdens, substrate, nestinitdate, collectiongroup, deviceinfo, last_edited FROM entries WHERE id = #{uuid}

SELECT id, datetime, latitude, longitude, accuracy, altitude, altaccuracy, site, setting, vegtype, notes, clientversion, imagekey, vegdens, substrate, nestinitdate, collectiongroup, deviceinfo, last_edited FROM entries WHERE collectiongroup = #{group} AND deleted = FALSE
